name: autonomous-engineering-platform
description: Autonomous Engineering Intelligence Platform - E2E Tests

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix extensions/vscode-aep && npm install --prefix extensions/vscode-aep/webview
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix extensions/vscode-aep/webview && npm run compile --prefix extensions/vscode-aep
scripts.dev: echo 'run package-level dev scripts: e.g., npm run dev --prefix frontend'
scripts.lint: echo 'root lint: add package-level lint when ready'
scripts.typecheck: echo 'root typecheck: add package-level checks when ready'
